articles.author: Mary McDougall, Kate Duguid
articles.title: Huge US government borrowing adds to bond market pain - Financial Times
articles.description: Big increase in issuance and stagnant demand has exacerbated drop in Treasury bond prices, say analysts
articles.content:
A step-up in borrowing by the US government has deepened a decline in bond markets that has sent yields to their highest point since 2007, analysts and investors say. 
Much of the recent bond rout r… [+4875 chars]

articles.author: David Sheppard
articles.title: Diesel prices fall as Russia lifts ban on seaborne exports - Financial Times
articles.description: Restrictions on country’s gasoline exports remain in place
articles.content: Russia has lifted a ban on diesel exports that had threatened to tighten global supplies of the crucial industrial fuel and raised concerns that Moscow was shifting its energy war to the oil market.… [+3196 chars]
